Tested and working on NO$GBA.

For those with the cannot read data message: you have to open the emulation setup and change the "NDS Cartridge Backup Media" to EEPROM 64Kbytes.

The above should work for any other emulator with a similar option by the way, just change the backup from Flash to EEPROM, and you're good to go, you'll know you did it right when pressing start on the title screen gives you a proper menu.
